title: Trying to enable hold for me on my Pixel 4xl? Not showing in settings on google phone app?
content:
Hello all,

I have a Pixel 4xl and I can't find the hold for me option in the phone app. I have version 58.0.346367036. It also doesn't show up in any search on the phone either.

Thanks in Advance,

Joe
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
